page.title: 04A Family in Milton Ernest
page.content: A Saturday in this household in{Milton {Ernest,}means a leisurely breakfast of cereal, toast, orange juice and coffee at about 0800h. We are all at home today. The morning is spent in Bedford shopping, going to the library and having coffee in a cafe. We sometimes look at a{Do_It_Yourself shop}or {Garden Centre}on the way home. After a sandwich lunch the afternoon is spent either in the garden or on a drive to a nearby village to ring church bells. The evening is spent watching {television,}playing{computer games}or reading. Occasionally Claire plays the {flute}while dad accompanies on the {piano.}Our evening meal may be pizza and salad which everyone likes and can help prepare. Bedtime is 2100h for the children and later for we parents, after a glass of wine.
